column2: Ruhnn Holding Ltd. engages in the key opinion leader (KOL) cultivation and incubation platforms. The company is headquartered in Hangzhou, Zhejiang and currently employs 836 full-time employees. Its main business is online sales of KOL consumer products to fans through their various social networks. Besides, the Company is also engaged in the provision of advertising services. The firm mainly conducts its businesses in domestic market.
Floor 8-12, Building No. 2, Hangzhou Lvgu Innovation Center
